```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(gganimate)
```

```{r}
x = seq(.95, .05, -.01)
y = rev(x)-.2
z = x + (1/y)
pdata = data.frame(x=x, y=y, error=z)

ggplot(data=pdata, aes(x=x, y=y)) +
  geom_abline(intercept=1, slope=-1) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_classic() +
  xlim(c(0,1)) +
  ylim(c(0,1)) +
  coord_cartesian(expand=F)
```
